name: time (itch) (p0isonedpanda)
description:
For now, this is a prototype/proof of concept but I plan on expanding this further to explore what I can do with time (heh)

This is a pay what you want game, so buy me a coffee to fuel development! Since I do this in my spare time with what little resources I have, any money you can spare to fuel the development process would be greatly appreciated. However, if you're a student I don't want you giving me any money. Use it for your own coffee, you need it more than I do.

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/p0isonedpanda/time
